blobs.changelog:
- Auto detect meter mode
- Changed MQTT auto discovery online state behavior
- Fix wifi scan javascript bug
- Combined import/export sensor
- UI password protection
- Factory reset
- Webclient support validation changed
- Minor various changes

- Align sensor names to latest Home Assistant release rules.
- Current gauges cards in web UI.
- AWS IoT Core/MQTT TLS support.
- Optional JSON payload for sensor states.
